name: Space Companions - Crushing through Space
description:
Space wizard Gen and his drone friend SK-1pp.3r are on their way back to their ship.They’ve been exploring the long forgotten roboruins on Saturn’s moon Europa, but it seems like this dangerous place isn’t so abandoned after all?! Only Teamwork can get them through this!

Controls:
WAD: Move
Left Click: Shoot
Right Click: Control Companion
Shift/Space: Drag to Companion

Music from:  
HUMBLE BIG MUSIC BUNDLE FOR GAMES, FILMS, AND CONTENT CREATORS
